items.content_html: Universal Resource Finder A global platform designed to help users discover free, high-quality resources across various categories like technology, design, education, and business. This lightweight and community-driven website makes it easy to find tools, templates, courses, and more from trusted sources. Key Features: Powerful Search: Instantly

This lightweight and community-driven website makes it easy to find tools, templates, courses, and more from trusted sources.  Key Features: Powerful Search: Instantly

items.content_html: "TaskFlow: A modern, lightweight to-do app designed to keep you organized and focused. Features include task categorization, reminders, progress tracking, and a clean, intuitive interface to help you manage your day efficiently. Built with simplicity and productivity in mind."
items.title: A-Mikayelyan/TodoForge: "TaskFlow: A modern, lightweight to-do app designed to keep you organized and focused. Features include task categorization, reminders, progress tracking, and a clean, intuitive interface to help you manage your day efficiently. Built with simplicity and productivity in mind."

items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.
items.title: testcontainers/testcontainers-node: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

items.content_html: NodeWizard is a lightweight, dynamic, node-based flow handler designed to manage multi-step processes such as forms, wizards, or step-by-step workflows in JavaScript applications.
items.title: omikrom/node-wizard: NodeWizard is a lightweight, dynamic, node-based flow handler designed to manage multi-step processes such as forms, wizards, or step-by-step workflows in JavaScript applications.

items.content_html: The Asura Ad Remover is a lightweight browser extension designed to enhance your browsing experience on the asuracomic.net website. It automatically removes intrusive UI elements. This extension ensures a distraction-free reading experience without unnecessary interruptions.
items.title: talha-devp/AsuraComic-Ad-Remover: The Asura Ad Remover is a lightweight browser extension designed to enhance your browsing experience on the asuracomic.net website. It automatically removes intrusive UI elements. This extension ensures a distraction-free reading experience without unnecessary interruptions.

items.content_html: A lightweight and easy-to-use application to track your investments and portfolio performance. This tool allows you to manage assets, monitor profits/losses, and analyze holdings efficiently. Perfect for personal use or small-scale portfolio management.
items.title: naitikraj1000/Simple-Portfolio-Tracker: A lightweight and easy-to-use application to track your investments and portfolio performance. This tool allows you to manage assets, monitor profits/losses, and analyze holdings efficiently. Perfect for personal use or small-scale portfolio management.
